title: Should Mordekaiser be able to W minions?
body: They're weaker than champs, don't listen to your instructions and get killed very easily. It won't be OP unless you're in bronze. It's like Riot wants to intentionally make solo laning impossible on Mordekaiser by adding these ridiculous requirements.

replies.body:
>  what's a apc I only know top and jg what's this weird role you say

Back in the day us morde mains always played him mid, and he was fine there. But then Rito came along and tried to force a new meta by giving morde an ability that is only effective in a duo lane. 

Back to your question ,what's happening now is that both "adc" and "support" are meant to go relic shield

_________________________________________

Mordekaiser es numero uno huehuehuehuehuehue
Rito forced me to play morde as an apc
what's a apc I only know top and jg what's this weird role you say
he actually solo lanes quite well. he cant w minions because the heal would be too strong, free healing and movespeed for no reason
But in bot lane it's perfectly fine for TWO people to have free healing and movespeed for no reason?
but in botlane, one of the champs will have to get into range to heal, and can be poked at and lose more hp than they gain, with a minion is just free healing no chance to be damages.
True, I didn't think of that. Maybe minions shouldn't heal you at all if they die?

Because solo lane morde against another melee would be an absolute FORCE. With his Q damage buff, imagine being able to solo lane without being harassed from range and doing 3 autos for over 3k damage. Imagine adding the ability to heal too...

His Q damage is already BS. The only reason Riot gave it to him was because they knew in a melee v ranged match he shouldn't be able to use it often but when he does, look out.

Honestly think Riot were thinking about the Pro's and the "2v1 meta". Wouldn't be suprised if you see top laners learn morde and lane with the supp while the ADC solo lanes against the enemy top laner.

Maybe even "double jungle" morde since his healing is 100% of damage done to monsters/champions. Why not full clear the jungle with the jungler, both stay healthy, go top, share the wave... hmmm... needs more thought.
